title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.5 - Time for declaration of overweight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.5 - Time for declaration of overweight

State Regulations

If a jockey intends to carry overweight exceeding by more
than two pounds the weight which his horse is to carry, the owner or trainer
consenting, he must declare the amount of overweight to the clerk of the scales
at least 45 minutes before the time appointed for the race, and the clerk shall
cause the overweight to be stated on the notice commission immediately. For
failure on the part of a jockey to comply with this section, he may be
punished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4225.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
